title: Somashekhar Arabali | Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website built with React.js .

title: AWS Prep for CLF-C02 Exam Practice
description: A fully responsive AWS CLF-C02 practice platform built with Next.js (App Router). Includes dynamic questions, validation with Zod, result tracking, and a polished UI powered by Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components.

title: Starbucks Website
description: Full-stack Starbucks clone with React frontend, Node/Express backend, JWT auth, and MongoDB-powered product & order system.

title: SITS Complaint Management System
description: A full-stack complaint management system built using React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase.

title: Real Estate Website
description: A platform providing advanced search filters for an enhanced home-buying and renting experience.

title: Online Resume Builder
description: A web application to build and manage online resumes with various templates.

title: CICD Migration
description: Migrated GitHub CI pipelines to Azure CI pipelines, improving deployment efficiency and reliability.

title: Java Spring Boot Microservice
description: Developed a RESTful microservice using Spring Boot for a scalable backend application.

title: Image Label Generator
description: Built an image label generator leveraging Amazon Rekognition to detect objects, scenes, and activities in images, providing detailed labels and confidence scores.

title: Text Narrator (Amazon Polly)
description: Developed a text-to-speech narrator using Amazon Polly and AWS Lambda, converting text into lifelike speech and storing audio files in S3 for easy access.

title: Language Translation Bot
description: Created a conversational AI bot using Amazon Lex and AWS Lambda for real-time language translation, integrating with Amazon Translate to provide multilingual support.

title: Bucket List Tracker (AWS Amplify)
description: Deployed a full-stack bucket list tracker application on AWS Amplify, featuring a React frontend, serverless backend (Lambda/DynamoDB), and CI/CD integration.
